name: Calculate Hours for Panel Layout Drawing
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA Panel Layout Drawings:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((8*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Additional Power Supply Boxes)*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Additional Power Supply Boxes)*>))*0.25)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(((8*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Additional Power Supply Boxes)*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Additional Power Supply Boxes)*>))*0.25))*0.25) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,[NEQ](<*VALUE(FDA GES Location)*>,None))){<* Eval((((8*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Additional Power Supply Boxes)*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Additional Power Supply Boxes)*>))*0.25))*0.25)*1.1) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
